p: Some observations or published data of MAC across the PL system were overlaid as numbers on the annual precipitation from 1950 to 2016–2017 (Figure 6). There were registered high abundances of MAC only on the negative anomaly of annual precipitation, i.e., over dry years, specifically in 1988, 1994, 2006, 2010–2012, and 2017 (Figure 6). These published data described these years associated with long water residence time and strong thermal stratification in the Patos Lagoon.
